
set or clear each of the following pins to
indicate which of the 16 pins to read
PB3
PB4
PB5
PB6

clear the following pin to enable the device
PB10


binary BSRR codes for the 16 pins with enable
0  = 0b0000010001111000 0000000000000000
1  = 0b0000010001110000 0000000000001000
2  = 0b0000010001101000 0000000000010000
3  = 0b0000010001100000 0000000000011000
4  = 0b0000010001011000 0000000000100000
5  = 0b0000010001010000 0000000000101000
6  = 0b0000010001001000 0000000000110000
7  = 0b0000010001000000 0000000000111000
8  = 0b0000010000111000 0000000001000000
9  = 0b0000010000110000 0000000001001000
10 = 0b0000010000101000 0000000001010000
11 = 0b0000010000100000 0000000001011000
12 = 0b0000010000110000 0000000001100000
13 = 0b0000010000100000 0000000001011000
14 = 0b0000010000001000 0000000001110000
15 = 0b0000010000000000 0000000001111000

binary BSRR code to disable
15 = 0b0000000001111000 0000000000000000
